WorkItem.ClosedComment:
We're working in the develop branch, but many of the devs on the project prefer to work locally and only 'push' every few days. Sometimes they take weekends off, when we let them :)

If you see something 'fixed' but it's still a problem working from the latest sources in the develop branch, please do let us know. The Visual Studio components are not part of the CodePlex project, so this only applies to the compiler itself. Thanks!
WorkItem.Description: Are the fixes committed to another internal source control?
WorkItem.Summary: I see a lot of issues marked as fixed but there is no commit on develop branch in the last 3 days...

Comments.Message:
:-)

The idea is that typescript has the potential to be very cool stuff, so i am very eager to see the rough edges get polished ...
Keep up the good work.
